name: Nut Berry
overview: A girl has eaten an apple and suddenly became tiny. Her boyfriend realizes that was the work of a group of female witches, and embarks on a journey to find them and lift the curse, all the while being confronted by their minions. Nut Berry is a quiz game with strategy board game elements. The player character moves on a map according to a number randomly resulting from throwing dice. Each location leads to a short quiz proposed by a female character. Answering three questions correctly will win the "battle"; each wrong answer depletes the hero's HP. Special locations such as houses and castles contain young women who undress when the player answers a question correctly.
